name: The Widsith
desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.

values.desc: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color>. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by <color=#99FFFFFF>48%</color>. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>240</color>.
